Introduction

Park Ji-Young, best known by her promotional name Kahi, is a South Korean singer, songwriter, and actress. She is the former leader of the South Korean girl group After School, and their sub-group A.S. Red formed by Pledis Entertainment. Kahi is also a former member of the Korean-American girl group S.Blush.

On December 10, 2021, Kahi joined the reality show Mama The Idol and debuted in the girl group Mamadol (M.M.D).
